mapper.sql: EQUIPMENT_ID, BRAND, CONFIGURE_TIME, DEPARTMENT, USER, CPU, RAM, ROM, OS, BROWSER, OFFICE_SOFTWARE, USED_FOR, IP_ADDRESS, MAC_ADDRESS, REGION
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from tbl_equipments
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_equipments (EQUIPMENT_ID, BRAND, CONFIGURE_TIME, DEPARTMENT, USER, CPU, RAM, ROM, OS, BROWSER, OFFICE_SOFTWARE, USED_FOR, IP_ADDRESS, MAC_ADDRESS, REGION) values (#{EQUIPMENT_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{BRAND,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CONFIGURE_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DEPARTMENT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CPU,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RAM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ROM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BROWSER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OFFICE_SOFTWARE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{USED_FOR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IP_ADDRESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MAC_ADDRESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REGION,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tbl_equipments
BRAND = #{BRAND,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONFIGURE_TIME = #{CONFIGURE_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTMENT = #{DEPARTMENT,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER = #{USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CPU = #{CPU,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RAM = #{RAM,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROM = #{ROM,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

BROWSER = #{BROWSER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

USED_FOR = #{USED_FOR,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP_ADDRESS = #{IP_ADDRESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAC_ADDRESS = #{MAC_ADDRESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGION = #{REGION,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where EQUIPMENT_ID = #{EQUIPMENT_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_equipments set BRAND = #{BRAND,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFIGURE_TIME = #{CONFIGURE_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTMENT = #{DEPARTMENT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER = #{USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CPU = #{CPU,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RAM = #{RAM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROM = #{ROM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OS = #{OS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BROWSER = #{BROWSER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFICE_SOFTWARE = #{OFFICE_SOFTWARE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USED_FOR = #{USED_FOR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP_ADDRESS = #{IP_ADDRESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAC_ADDRESS = #{MAC_ADDRESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION = #{REGION,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EQUIPMENT_ID = #{EQUIPMENT_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
